name: Lufia: Curse of the Sinistrals
description:
Lufia: Curse of the Sinistrals is an action-RPG game developed by Neverland. It came out on 25-02-2010. It was published by Natsume. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Lufia: Curse of the Sinistrals is available on Nintendo DS.
Hajime Kojima produced the game. It was directed by Masahide Miyata. Tomoko Morita, Yasunori Shiono and Yukio Nakajima scored the game.
